name: Block Builder
description:
This is a building sandbox where you get to build to your hearts content.  This is a challenging game and was inspired by my son who loves building with very colorful blocks. This is available here for PC or for your mobile device on the GooglePlay Store ( https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.BickelGaming.BlockBuilder ). A list of the controls that are not displayed in game are below.

Left Click: Places an object when the camera move button is not activated

A: Rotates last placed object to the left.

D: Rotates last placed object to the right.

While the Camera Move button is activated you use the Left, right and middle mouse buttons to move the camera.
